attributes.action: Ban cold-calling and advertisement of post accident claims management companies
attributes.additional_details:
Cold-calling and advertisement of post accident health related claims management companies stimulate a great number of false claims which lead to rocketing insurance premiums.
* Ban cold-calling and advertisement of post accident claims.
* Create a simple and effective complaints procedure that will lead to enforcement of heavy fines on such companies who do not comply
* Enforce strict medical checks and if the claim is found false make the claimant pay legal fees.
